question: Who among the following heads the National Indicator Framework (NIF) for monitoring of Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)?
option1: Minister of Statistics and Programme Implementation
explanation: The Union Cabinet has approved the constitution of a High Level Steering Committee for periodically reviewing and refining the National Indicator Framework (NIF) for monitoring of SDGs with associated targets. It does not include financial implications but respective Ministries will need to re-align and strengthen their data systems to facilitate monitoring of the SDG indicators. This committee will be chaired by the Chief Statistician of India and Secretary, Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MoSPI). The members will include the Secretaries of data source Ministries and NITI Aayog and Secretaries of other related Ministries as special invitees, with function of reviewing of NIF.
